properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We sailed upon the good ship Venus By Christ you should have seen us The figurehead was a whore in bed The mast an upright penis

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The Captain's name was Lugger By Christ he was a bugger He wasn't fit to shovel shit From one ship to another

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Chorus every two verses Friggin' in the riggin' Friggin' in the riggin' Friggin' in the riggin' There was fuck all else to do

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The first mate's name was Cooper By Christ, he was a trooper He jerked and jerked until he worked Himself into a stupor

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And the second mate was Andy By Christ he had a dandy Till they crushed his cock on a jagged rock For cumming in the brandy

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The third mate's name was Morgan By God he was a gorgon Ten times a day sweet tunes he'd play On his fuckin' organ

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Captain's wife was Mabel And by God was she able To give the crew their daily screw Upon the galley table

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: The captain's daughter Charlotte Was born and bred a harlot Her thighs at night were lily white By morning they were scarlet

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: The cabin boy was Kipper By Christ he was a nipper He stuffed his ass with broken glass And circumcised the skipper

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: The captain's lovely daughter Liked swimming in the water Delighted squeals came when some eels Found her sexual quarters

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: When we reached our station Through skillful navigation The ship got sunk in a wave of spunk From too much fornication

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: On the good ship Venus By Christ you should have seen us The figurehead was a whore in bed Sucking a dead man's penis
